item.title: About me...
item.description:
About me...

Hi there, I am Amanda (also known as Mandy, Mands, Manda Panda, Mand, MandySue...hey you... and a few more) and am a legal alien now living in Munich, Germany; I love food, coffee, wine and Café Culture... wholefoods, health & wellness, natural stuff, essential oils, photography....so many things!

item.title: How To Make Kombucha Tea at Home - Cooking Lessons from The Kitchn
item.description:
How To Make Kombucha Tea at Home - Cooking Lessons from The Kitchn

I've been addicted to kombucha from first sip. It wasn't really the probiotics or other health promises that did it for me - although I'll take those, too! It was the way it tasted: like tart green apple mixed with sour stone fruits, but with an underlying sweetness that keeps it all together.

item.title: Gardener's Hand Soap | doTERRA Essential Oils
item.description:
Gardener's Hand Soap | doTERRA Essential Oils

Planting and maintaing your own garden has many benefits; however, the dirt-stained hands you get from gardening are far from ideal. This easy-to-make Gardener's Hand Soap exfoliates, cleanses, and moisturizes all in one use!

item.title: DIY: Bronzing Lotion Stick with Oils | doTERRA Essential Oils
item.description:
DIY: Bronzing Lotion Stick with Oils | doTERRA Essential Oils

These do-it-yourself lotion sticks provide extreme moisture and add a beautiful sun-kissed glow to your skin using your favorite essential oils.

item.title: DIY: Spring Fling Room Spray | doTERRA Essential Oils
item.description:
DIY: Spring Fling Room Spray | doTERRA Essential Oils

This Spring Fling spray is light, fresh, and has a touch of sweetness and tart.

item.title: DIY: Cuticle Cream with Lavender and Myrrh Oils | doTERRA Essential Oils
item.description:
DIY: Cuticle Cream with Lavender and Myrrh Oils | doTERRA Essential Oils

Cold weather can be tough on your skin and cuticles. Try this homemade cuticle cream with Lavender and Myrrh essential oils and bring health back to your nails.

item.title: Calming & Cleansing...Detox Bath Salts
item.description:
Calming & Cleansing...Detox Bath Salts

Here is an alternative to my Lavender Relaxing Bath Salts....This one is divine in smell... both Men and Women like this one - yes, it is a little more flowery but the delightful benefits are one to be enjoyed by all.

item.title: Homemade Loot...it’s all good!
item.description:
Homemade Loot...it’s all good!

There is some amount of great satisfaction in knowing that you made something; that what you have made is from natural organic and easily sourced materials and most importantly it is free from many of those unpleasant toxins and chemicals found in many commercial store bought products.

item.title: Delicious & healthy stuffed Pita Bread
item.description:
Delicious & healthy stuffed Pita Bread

Ever gone to the kitchen, opened the fridge & just stood in front of the cold opening just staring at the contents blindly thinking "I have nothing to eat!"....? Well that was me the other day, it was ridiculous...
